: Mangilao is home to a number of Guam's institutions of higher learning, including the University of Guam, Guam Community College, and Pacific Islands University (which also includes Pacific Islands Bible College).

value: : Accessible by both car and public transit (though the latter can be slow and unreliable), the University of Guam is the island's oldest institution of higher learning. Located along a cliffline above the eastern edge of Guam, the campus has incredible views of the ocean and coastline below. The campus itself is pleasant to stroll about. A sidewalk also encricles much of the campus; from roughly 5pm until sundown, it's common to see many students and local residents running or walking along this path for exercise.
